name: Stand-Stiller
description:
This is an updated version of Stand Still game, with a minimal "how to play" at start and a correct progression between the levels, as well as minor corrections on hitbox and moves.

The Stand Still game was my very first "complete" game, made from scratch in 7 hours for myLudum Dare 46, using Unity, Aseprite, and my own mouth for the  sounds...
